hero.title: Professional Legal AI Tools

crypto.title: Crypto Compliance Legal Assistant
crypto.description: Comprehensive AI legal assistant specialized in cryptocurrency compliance, exchange regulations, ICO legal opinions, token classification, and AML/KYC requirements. Access dedicated tools for crypto-specific legal documentation and regulatory guidance.

analyzer.title: Document Analyzer
analyzer.description: Analyze emails, contracts, evidence, and legal documents. Extract key facts, identify parties, dates, and legal issues with precision.

researcher.title: Legal Researcher
researcher.description: Research laws, regulations, and court decisions. Get comprehensive analysis of how legal principles apply to your cases.

drafter.title: Document Drafter
drafter.description: Draft contracts, motions, briefs, complaints, and other legal documents with precision and proper legal formatting.

reviewer.title: Document Reviewer
reviewer.description: Review and edit legal documents for accuracy, completeness, and effectiveness. Get detailed feedback on improvements.

precision.title: Precision-Focused
precision.description: Built specifically for legal work where every word matters. Low-temperature AI models ensure accuracy over creativity.

secure.title: Secure & Confidential
secure.description: All processing is encrypted and secure. Your client information and legal work remain confidential.

timeSaving.title: Time-Saving
timeSaving.description: Automate routine tasks and get instant insights. Spend more time on strategy and client relationships.
